attributes.action: Remove the traffic lights at the exit of the m27 onto the m271
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove the traffic lights at the exit of the m27 onto the m271."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13578.asp

Prime Minister's Office
